statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, device_id, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, humidity FROM SensorData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY device_id, timestamp;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE humidity > 70 AND device_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 4) ORDER BY temperature DESC, device_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM SensorData WHERE device_id = 1 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM SensorData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature >= 25 AND humidity <= 60 ORDER BY device_id, timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM device_info WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_info WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, data_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, data_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, status FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Temperature' AND status = 'Active';
SELECT device_id, device_name, installation_date FROM device_info WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY installation_date;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM Devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM SensorData;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location = 'Room A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM Sensors WHERE value > 100.00 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM Devices WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, value FROM SensorData WHERE data_type LIKE '%humidity%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM Sensors GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_sensors > 5 ORDER BY total_sensors DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_type FROM sensors ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_type FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%lab%' ORDER BY sensor_name;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE data_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type FROM sensors WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%humidity%' OR location LIKE '%Server Room%' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE data_type = 'Pressure' AND location LIKE '%Lab%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, model FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT sensor_id, reading, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_id FROM device_sensor_mapping WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, reading FROM sensors WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY reading DESC
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, model FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT sd.sensor_id, sd.reading, sd.timestamp, s.sensor_type FROM sensor_data sd INNER JOIN sensors s ON sd.sensor_id = s.sensor_id ORDER BY sd.timestamp
